name: Hate To See
description:
2D Platformer in which you play as love. But, as the saying goes, love is blind. You must hate to see.

Use executables (found below) instead of web build for better performance.

Controls:

AD/Left and Right arrow - Move

Space - Jump

X/Shift - Hate

Escape - Quit

The game will save what level you have reached and this value resets when restarting via the end screen (press R on the end screen).

Made for the second Brackeys Game Jam (in around 6 days)
